==========
Installing
==========

Quickplots will run on all versions of Python 3. Backporting to Python 2 may be
done at a later date.


PyPI
====

Quickplots can be installed from `PyPI <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/quickplots/>`_.
To install, use:

.. code-block:: bash

  pip install quickplots


Dependencies
============

Quickplots has no third-party dependencies.


GitHub
======

The latest version of quickplots will always be available `at GitHub
<https://github.com/samirelanduk/quickplots>`_, and can be cloned with:

.. code-block:: bash

  git clone git://github.com/samirelanduk/quickplots.git
